page.title: 05My visit to Wetton Mill
page.content: At Wetton Mill in the Manifold Valley, they have a shop and a camp site. They get lots of tourists all year round but they get a lot more in summer and very few in winter. They open the shop every day of the week. In winter it is very cold, but they don't get a lot of snow. The land around Wetton Mill is hilly. It is picturesque and has pleasant scenery. It is partly woodland and partly rough grazing. In the Manifold Valley there is Thor's Cave which is very ancient and was once lived in by animals and cavemen. Access to the Manifold Valley can be gained at Waterhouses and at Wetton Mill near the site of an old railway track which is now a cycle track. The Manifold River goes underground to meet the River Dove.
